issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description:
ARROW-15639 solved by PR:[https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12590]

It broke some build packages because it requires Python 3.7. The summary of broken build packages can be found here: [https://lists.apache.org/thread/6bdwrqnq8y5lrm61m9y1d4wz8slzfkz2] 

The discussion on the fix was discussed in the PR thread itself: We should drop support for Python 3.6 because Python 3.6 reached EOL.
